name: Georgios Theodoropoulos 0001
content: Professor Georgios Theodoropoulos Contact theogeorgios@gmail.com Tweets by @theogeorgios Home I am currently a Chair Professor in the School of Computer Science  and Engineering at SUSTech in Shenzhen, China's Silicon Valley.  I joined SUSTech from  Durham University, UK where I was the inaugural Executive Director of the Institute of Advanced Research Computing, a Chair in Computer Engineering and the Head of the Innovative Computing Group at the School of Engineering and Computing Sciences.  In the past, I was a Senior Research Scientist with IBM Research, Ireland, held an Adjunct Chair at Trinity College Dublin and positions at the University of Birmingham and the  Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. I am Ordinary Member of the European Academy of Sciences and Arts, and a Fellow of the World Academy of Art and Science I am Accredited Board Director from the Singapore Institute of Directors, a Member of the Hong Kong Institute of Directors and I hold the INSEAD Certificate in Corporate Governance (INSEAD International Directors Programme). I am a Chartered Engineer and I hold a PhD in Computer Science  from the University of Manchester (S. Furber's AMULET/APT Group).
